ReportSection.title: Sabbatical Application - Recommended but Not Approved
ReportSection.ReportItem:
This is to inform you that your application for a {getText({$report_type}, TABLE, SABB_DURATION, {$user_id}, 1, 0)} month sabbatical from {getText({$report_type}, TABLE, SABB_START, {$user_id}, 1, 0)} to {getText({$report_type}, TABLE, SABB_END, {$user_id}, 1, 0)} was recommended for approval by the FEC; however, higher-ranked applications received first approval which has resulted in the Faculty reaching maximum quota and your application not being approved.

You are encouraged to apply for sabbatical again. Should you choose to do so, please ensure your application is submitted by {getText({$report_type}, TABLE, FOLLOWUP_DATE, {$user_id}, 1, 0)}.
